name: Spaceship Soda
description:
Controls

Left Click: Shoot

Right Click: Zoom 

Movement: WADS

Jump: Space 

Shift: Sprint 

Hook-shot: E 

Crouch: C

Switch Weapons: Q / Scroll Wheel / 1-4

-----------------

Spaceship Soda is an audio reactive first person shooter that's all about the vibes, gameplay, and aesthetics. 

***This game is still in development.*** 

The music in this demo is from Pogo, but eventually the playlist will be a collaborative collection of original music from producers from around the world, including some of my own music. 

Sound design is also still a place holder and will be eventually replaced with original sound design. 

Thanks for checking out my game! Any feedback is welcome.
